title: Coronavirus: Lifting of Wales' travel limits gets go-ahead
description: Scrapping of the "stay local" restrictions from Monday are confirmed by Mark Drakeford.

title: Coronavirus: England’s quarantine-free list of countries published
description: Greece, Belgium and Spain are among the countries on the list but Portugal and the US are not.

title: Coronavirus: Almost 30,000 'excess' care homes deaths
description: The figures from the ONS are the first to reveal the full toll of the epidemic in care homes.

title: Redskins agree review of team's name
description: The review comes after FedEx told the Washington DC-based American football team to rename itself.

title: Liverpool will not hand out appearances like Christmas presents - Klopp
description: Liverpool will not give Premier League appearances like "Christmas presents" to young players despite having already won the title, says boss Jurgen Klopp.

title: Coronavirus: Nicola Sturgeon attacks 'shambolic' air bridges decision
description: Scotland's first minister criticises the UK government over a plan to relax quarantine restrictions for many overseas visitors.

title: Hamilton dominates Austrian GP practice as F1 returns
description: Lewis Hamilton made a powerful statement of intent as the Formula 1 season finally got under way at the Austrian Grand Prix.

title: Coronavirus: NI hotels and bars reopen their doors
description: Economy Minister Diane Dodds hails Friday a "great day for the hospitality sector".

title: Cricket teas and dressing rooms a risk, says PM
description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson says recreational cricket is not yet safe to play because of issues surrounding "communal teas and dressing rooms".

title: England all-rounder Curran tests negative for coronavirus
description: England all-rounder Sam Curran returns a negative test for coronavirus.

title: Manu Tuilagi: Overseas move would halt England career, says RFU
description: The Rugby Football Union has no plans to change the rules regarding foreign-based players even if Manu Tuilagi was to move abroad.

title: Coronavirus: Pubs can't open in England until 6am as lockdown eased
description: No 10 says it is a "sensible precaution" against midnight parties taking place across England.

title: UK government takes £400m stake in satellite firm OneWeb
description: The UK helps rescue company from bankruptcy as part of a plan to replace the EU's Galileo sat-nav system.

title: Coronavirus: Money back for Ryanair and Sykes customers
description: The airline says it is clearing a backlog of refunds while Sykes Cottages also has a new policy.

title: David Starkey resigns from university role over slavery comments
description: Cambridge University accepts David Starkey's resignation, saying: "We do not tolerate racism."

title: Wigan Athletic: EFL chairman Rick Parry secretly filmed discussing Wigan rumours
description: EFL chairman Rick Parry is secretly recorded by a Wigan fan discussing rumours related to the club's administration.

title: Pop Smoke has 'left us something special' with debut album
description: Radio 1 Newsbeat hears from fans of the rapper as his posthumous album is released.

title: Father and son 'left in limbo' by failed terror case
description: All Britons accused of terror offences linked to a Kurdish militia in Syria have been cleared.

title: Shirley Baker's street scenes of Manchester and Salford
description: A collection of photos by Shirley Baker shows elderly people from the mid-1960s to the mid-80s.

title: Coronavirus: Cardiff man meets doctor who saved his life
description: At one stage the oxygen level in Davide Compagnone's blood was lower than on Everest's peak.

title: F1 2020: Alex Albon's make or break year in a rollercoaster career?
description: He nearly quit motorsport for good, but 2020 is his chance to prove himself among the world's best.

title: The Papers: 'Pressure' on Prince Andrew and 'super Saturday'
description: The papers cover the fallout from the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell and warnings ahead of pubs reopening in England.

title: Coronavirus: Why surviving the virus may be just the beginning
description: For many survivors, waking up in intensive care was only the beginning of a long process of physical and psychological recovery.

title: Dream Wife: 'We need to practise what we preach'
description: The punk-pop band on working with an all-female team and why they question the need for validation.
